# Shamelessly stolen from patterns.h in Dr. Volt's TMS9918A
# Arduino project:
#
#  https://github.com/michalin/TMS9918_Arduino/blob/main/src/patterns.h
#
# Note that the font information starts with ASCII 32 (space).
# Each character consists of 8 bytes, each byte encoding the
# pixels of one row of the character.

0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00
0x20,0x20,0x20,0x20,0x20,0x00,0x20,0x00
